Topic.Title: Why does layout vary on different computer ?

Posts.EditableText: Game design is progressing nicely but when I copied file over to laptop running windows 10 all the nice layout I had produced to minimise scrolling appears to have gone and I have a very unsatisfying layout . Can I do anything about this ! I had assumed that once things looked good on one machine they would be ok on another !

Assuming this is the factor that's affecting the layout, then yes, I don't know that for sure, that's just my first guess.

EDIT: a way to check would be to change the resolution settings on the computer you were first working on, if you have it available, and see if it alters the layout in a similar way.
